model.name: setHeader
model.title: Set Header
model.description: Sets the value of a message header
model.label: eip,transformation

expression.description: Expression to return the value of the header

headerName.description: Name of message header to set a new value The simple language can be used to define a dynamic evaluated header name to be used. Otherwise a constant name will be used.

id.description: Sets the id of this node

description.description: Sets the description of this node
